bibl.title: A Sixth-century Tax Register from the Hermopolite Nome.
bibl.note: P. Lond. Herm. [= P. London Brit. Libr. Inv. Or. 6046]. Hermopolite Nome, 546-547 (?) - P. 5: Preface. - Introduction: 1. Acquisition, provenance, codicology; - 2. Palaeography; - 3. Language; - 4. Nature of the document and analysis of entries; - 5. Money; - 6. Chronology; - 7. Taxation; - 8. Tabulation of payments; - 9. Analysis of distribution of wealth; - 10. Occupations; - 11. The church; - 12. Onomastics. - Text and translation. - Notes to the text. - References. Indexes.
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S., James G. Keenan and Leslie S.B. MacCoull, A Sixth-century Tax Register from the Hermopolite Nome. (American Studies in Papyrology. 51.)
Durham, North Carolina, American Society of Papyrologists (Diffusion: Oxbow Books), 2011, 4Â°, 225 pp. et 4 pll. ISBN 978-0-9799758-4-4. $50.
